lines: We are writing to you because we need your help.
Last year, Anna Creesy was sent with the mission to map “the endless sea”. As her return was planned several months from now, contact with her was lost we assumed she was wrecked by the sea.
A few weeks ago, a fisherman brought us a journal. Even though it was badly damaged, we managed to transcript some of the writings, only to find out it was Anna’s travel notes.
You will find these notes on the back of this letter, which remain incomplete and cryptic. This is the only lead we have for now.
We do not know anyone who have even the slightest knowledge of these waters. But you, among all others, are able to sail on that sea.
We hope you will find out what happened,
